name: Cheat the Lottery With a Time Machine
name_original: Cheat the Lottery With a Time Machine
description: This is the first non RPG-Maker game I ever made. You're a poor college student who is trying not to get evicted. So you use the professor's time machine to rig the lottery by sending your own fake lotto balls back in time to replace the winning numbers. Get the frequency high enough on your lotto balls and head for the exit! Who knows? Maybe you will be able to pay your rent!
